item.title: A TCP proxy between networks in GCP
item.description: I worked on an interesting challenge recently and I thought it would be nice to write a blog post about it! A little bit of context first, there are two Google Cloud projects (which could be in two different organizations) and each one of those have their own network. A client in Project A needs to access an API in project B but this API is not publicly exposed for security reasons.
